Frank, on a related note, while I was with the City of El Dorado, KS we purchased several smart phones to be used by on-call staff for monitoring the wastewater and water plants. This reduced on-call time significantly for those departments.

author: Frank Lancaster
text:
We are re-examining our on call policies for utility, public works and police personnel, including any residence requirements based on required response times, compensation for being on call, housing assistance during on call periods.   If anyone has on call policies that you can share, it would be greatly appreciated.
Frank Lancaster
Town of Estes Park Colorado
flancaster@estes.org
title: On Call policies
